thread.title: Very comfortable and reasonable.
thread.title_full: Very comfortable and reasonable. - Review of Citadines Trafalgar Square London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Holiday_traveller940
title: Very comfortable and reasonable.
text:
I used one of the studio apartments and it was a very good size and had all that I needed. Breakfast was reasonable and hotel is in a great location. The price was very reasonable for the location. Embankment train station is only 100 metres from hotel. The laundry was also very handy and easy to use but a little expensive considering you operate the machines yourself.
Room Tip: The rooms on lower floors that are at the front of hotel do get some street noise late at night and... See more room tips
